PITCH.MISSION.DESCRIPTION: PlayItForward Token was founded by an entrepreneur software architect (aka AvidCoder), as a social experiment; not with the intention of trading for quick profits. It was created as the token needed to exist. PlayItForward's main intention is to be seen as a “Million Acts Of Kindness” Token. PlayItForward enables millions of micro-transactions targeting the right cause, potentially magnifying the impact in a positive way.
PITCH.MISSION.TITLE: PlayItForward: Mission
PITCH.PROPERTY.DESCRIPTION: PlayItForward is a decentralized token, as it is secured by millions of computers worldwide on the Ethereum network. It can be used to store value due to its limited supply, making its upside unlimited. It can also be transferred in tiny fractional amounts, making it a great vehicle for micro-transactions.
PITCH.PROPERTY.TITLE: PlayItForward: Token Property
PITCH.VALUE.DESCRIPTION: PlayItForward is released with an initial value of about $0.01 per token, with a fixed supply of 1,000,000 tokens, which is guaranteed through source-code, making it a deflationary token.
PITCH.VALUE.TITLE: PlayItForward: Token Value
PITCH.WHAT.DESCRIPTION: PlayItForward (PFWD)© is a decentralized digital token created by developers for developers. PlayItForward is used as a digital token to support open-source projects. It can also be used to support those who create positive and meaningful content, or simply anyone who deserves a helping-hand in achieving a greater good, for the benefit of their communities.
PITCH.WHAT.TITLE: PlayItForward: What is it?
SUCCESS.AUTH.SIGNUP: Account created. Check your email for email confirmation
SUCCESS.USER.EMAIL_CHANGE_REQUEST: Check for confirmation link in your new email
TERMS.DISCLAIMER.DESCRIPTION: PlayItForward Tokens are not securities nor investment contracts.  PlayItForward is a community driven project and not a registered digital currency. Digital tokens are not legal tender and not investments. Crypto market is highly risky and speculative in nature.  Nothing here should be considered as financial advice!
TERMS.DISCLAIMER.TITLE: Disclaimer
TERMS.PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: This website will not collect any of your private information, nor will it track you!.

TERMS.TERMS.DESCRIPTION: By owning PlayItForward Tokens, you acknowledge and agree that PlayItForward Tokens are not securities nor investment contracts. You also agree to hold the team harmless and not liable for any losses or taxes you may incur.
TERMS.TERMS.TITLE: Terms & Conditions
